name: superciliously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you think that you are better than other people, and that their opinions, beliefs, or ideas are not important: He glanced at them superciliously. See
supercilious
More examplesFewer examplesReynolds superciliously explained that they were actually helping his business. She looked down at them superciliously as she passed.While Darya was speaking, she listened, pressing her lips superciliously.In the interview, he was superciliously brusque.
